turns.text: How many children do you have
turns.label: qw

turns.text: Well I have two children and uh two stepdaughters
turns.label: sd

turns.text: So we have four altogether too
turns.label: sd

turns.text: Yeah Are you are you running ragged these days
turns.label: b

turns.text: Well no because mine are all grown
turns.label: nn

turns.text: So the topic for me - I I can only rera- relate now to my grandchildren
turns.label: sd^t

turns.text: -- good Impart me some wisdom Catherine

Uh I do take care of my youngest granddaughter uh most every Saturday Uh my daughter and her husband work Saturdays My daughter is uh uh doing schedule of uh twenty-four hours on the weekend but she gets paid for forty
turns.label: sd

turns.text: And Dave is uh in supervisory work and he has to work almost every Saturday so -
turns.label: sd

turns.text: Shes says how are you doing grandma today
turns.label: sd(^q)

turns.text: Are you surviving Is she ol- your oldest grandd- child
turns.label: qy

turns.text: Oh no no no No shes my baby
turns.label: nn

turns.text: Oh thats nice Now do your other grandchildren live in Dal- the Dallas area
turns.label: ba

turns.text: Do you get to see them
turns.label: qy

turns.text: How nice What treat You know being from Plano you know I know so very few people who have extended family in town Im real jealous when I hear that somebody has grandma around --
turns.label: ba

turns.text: And you know just so that they get to know their grandparents but also for help
turns.label: sd

turns.text: We dont we dont have that luxury But we have lots of friends and and everybody tends to be in the same boat So we we trade off whole lot with friends and you know run here and run there Were right smack dab in the middle of baseball season right now And we have three playing baseball
turns.label: sd

turns.text: Well they keep you hopping Im sure
turns.label: sv

turns.text: Well I know uh that uh one of the ladies I know they are very involved with their little girl and and I think its excellent because shes getting qualified quality time --
turns.label: sd

turns.text: -- for uh her musical uh talents --
-- and uh I think because she is uh the only child that they concentrate uh they would like to have more but that hasnt been uh possible
turns.label: sd

turns.text: And uh shes tried many uh avenues --
turns.label: sd

turns.text: -- and and so now its just you know that shes kind of resolved herself that yes this is going to be the only one
turns.label: sd(^q)

turns.text: And theyre focusing on all of her uh welfare
turns.label: sd

turns.text: uh-huh uh-huh Yeah well our kids you know - uh my daughter - uh sings with Younger Generation I dont know if youve ever heard of them There theyre singing group here in Plano
turns.label: b

turns.text: And theyre part of the ch- uh Plano Childrens Civics Civic Chorus
turns.label: sd

turns.text: And theyre going to Washington next December Uh to sing for President Bush at the White House at Christmas time
turns.label: sd

turns.text: So we have been really up to our eye balls in fund raising and trying to get uh -

Yeah it is It is So you know and then she plays softball and my son plays baseball and my stepdaughter plays softball so we we tend to do lot of running Things are very different nowadays than when I grew up --
turns.label: aa

turns.text: -- and Im sure when your children grew up you didnt you know - I dont remember doing all these things
turns.label: sv

turns.text: I certainly dont remember my parents running me here and there and supporting me in all these things but we had more I guess family time alone --
turns.label: sd

turns.text: -- every- everything is doing doing doing out of the house
It can be and and sometimes I you know I kind of long for the good old days when --
turns.label: aa

turns.text: -- we didnt do all these running But on the other hand we just love watching the kids play and getting to know the other parents and --
-- weve had lot of fun with that too
You have to look on that on the uh positive side of that
turns.label: sv

turns.text: My uh second grandson is in Cappella and I know what youre talking about when hes involved you know the children are involved --
turns.label: sd

turns.text: -- in that and hes been - he has traveled and they have won awards so I - know slash unit or part of previous slash unit
Yes slash problem should be ny
uh-huh And I know where youre coming from --
turns.label: b

turns.text: I think uh uh those type of children uh that are involved in things like that their uh goals are going to be set higher than the average child that are not participating in things
turns.label: sv

turns.text: Well I think so and and I think theyve learned whole lot about being part of team whether the team is your singing group your band your --
turns.label: aa

turns.text: -- you know you all have to pull together
Yeah and so Ive been real pleased with that too I think theyve learned some real good life skills Uh you know being --
turns.label: aa

turns.text: -- involved in all those things And uh -
-- nice to have in your background that you know then you can youre you can be very flexible
And uh theres less uh friction involved in relationships when you add that skill --
turns.label: sv

turns.text: And uh I mean lot of people that are adults are having to go back and learn those basics when our children are already learning that
turns.label: sv

turns.text: And I think its step giant step of progress I really do
turns.label: sv

turns.text: Give me some wonderful advice Catherine What is the best advice of mothering that you know
turns.label: ad

turns.text: Besides dont sweat the small stuff
turns.label: sd(^q)

turns.text: Well uh Cathy I think if you look to the Word of God --
uh-huh Oh thats good thats real good advice
turns.label: b

turns.text: -- and uh think on the things that are pure and lovely and uh keep your mind off of negative things
And keep your mind on positive things and and stress that to your children
turns.label: ad

turns.text: And uh even if theyre even if theyre discouraged tell them that thats just passing moment --
turns.label: ad

turns.text: -- and to dwell on those things that are uh not negative and that are positive things in their life --
-- and I think youll see lot of growth in uh in their ability to uh control their thought pattern and and when you employ the Word of God theres nothing as powerful as the Word of God
turns.label: sv

turns.text: Absolutely Well I would agree with that Were also real active in our church and my kids do an awful lot with that Allyson sings in the choir I told her thats gift from God and you need to return that back
turns.label: aa

turns.text: And you owe you owe that --
turns.label: ^q

turns.text: -- back to God because hes given you that ability and that talent and --
-- and thats real nice Im real proud of her Im equally proud of her when I see her in church as I am when I see her performing You know thats thats real neat
Well if she looks if she looks at it as you suggest that that thats that she can give her - her talent back to the Lord for His glory --
turns.label: sv

turns.text: -- and she can look at it that way and and uh thats -
